definitions.title: n.pr. 1. loc.: a.
definitions.body: in Benj. Jos 18:23 (P), Afar, etc.; 1Sa 13:7 Gofera; prob. = [[עֶפְרוֹן]]
perh. mod. eṭ-Ṭayyibeh, c. 4 miles NE. from Bethel, cf. GASm:Geogr. 252 Buhl:Geogr. 177.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in Manasseh, Efraqa: Ju Jdg 6:11, Jdg 8:27; cstr. [[עָפְרַת]] [[אֲבִי הָעֶזְרִי]] Jdg 6:24, but ´[[עָפְרָה וגו]] Jdg 8:32; c. [[ה]] loc. [[עָפְרָ֫תָה]] Ju Jdg 9:5.
